{
  collection (id:"{{ .collection_id }}") {
    id
    name
    description
    owner { group }
    elements {
    ...on Dataproduct {
      id
      name
      description
      repo
      pii
      keywords
      owner { group }
    }
    }
  }
}

RETURNS

{
  "data": {
    "collection": {
      "id": "{{ .collection_id }}",
      "name": "NewCollection",
      "description": "New Collection",
      "owner": {
        "group": "dataplattform@nav.no"
      },
      "elements": []
    }
  }
}
